Title: By Time Fire be Purged!
Description:
That big ol' slag elemental has taken the heart of me forge! Without it, a timeforge is just, well, a forge. And that's no use to a chronosmith!

Even if we had Seashellamayne, I wouldn't be able to repair it.

Such power cannot be allowed to remain in the possession of that... that molten moron!

The other elementals took off for the towers. I bet half me beard the big one's close by too.
ObjectivesText: Retrieve the Heart of the Timeforge.
PortraitGiverText: With the Heart of the Timeforge, Slagnaros now poses a threat to Eon's Fringe and all of the Dragon Isles.
